infrastructure.name: Service Integration and Debugging
infrastructure.description: Integrated various AWS services and debugged issues preventing GPU EC2 instance deployment within ECS.
steps: Reviewed ECS task definitions and cluster configurations.
Verified resource availability in the VPC and subnets for GPU instances.
Ensured proper IAM roles and permissions for deployment.
Analyzed CloudWatch logs and ECS service events.

infrastructure.name: Issue Identification and Resolution
infrastructure.description: Resolved the deployment issue preventing GPU EC2 instances from launching within ECS.
steps: Identified misconfigurations in ECS task definitions and IAM roles.
Corrected VPC, subnet, and task definitions to support GPU EC2 instances.
Tested and confirmed the successful deployment of GPU EC2 instances.
